name: Phish Bait
description:
Description:

Go through your first day at your new job. However, it seems there is someone trying to get your information. Use techniques of determining phishing emails to keep all your information secure.

This game was made for the Cybersecurity Game Jam

Credits:

Adam Fowler (@adamfow1er) : Code / Design

Matthew Bolivar : Writing

Twitter @BonesFungus : Art / Visual Design
